So, I opened my gifts and I got a $50 mastercard, a $50 amazon,1 sweater, 2 sweat pants, 6 shirts,1 pj pants and Sixlets (I love those candies).

My mom said she has more presents for us at home :o, gotta wait 4 hours cause of the drive :c.

Edit: Oh, I forgot about the Minecraft figurine my uncle got me lol...
